description: In a video address to the International Olympic Committee, China’s leader promised to deliver a “safe and splendid Games” amid the coronavirus pandemic.
title: ‘China Is Ready’ for the Winter Olympics, Xi Jinping Says
title_page: ‘China Is Ready’ for the Winter Olympics, Xi Jinping Says - The New York Times
